name: Verse Surf
description:
Whether you're a 60s rolling stone, a 70s disco queen, an 80's big hair rocker or just a walking music database, prove your skills and steal the scene in this party game.

Along with up to 8 players, you can use your phone or tablet as a game controller and vote your favorite playlist. After you listen to song samples, send your lies as song lyrics and gain points when your friends vote your lies.
"I can get no ___" Coffee? Reaction? Satisfaction?

You’ll maybe get a “thanks” if you vote your friends’ lies, but keep in mind that the truth always makes you a winner.
